content: crochet this beautiful wildrose market bag that is composed of 13 granny squares seamed together in a special way this eye-catching bag uses a variety of crochet stitches and is very sturdy using strong mercerized cotton and a dense strap using the waistcoat stitch this bag is the perfect way to carry around your groceries beach and travel items see my accompanying step-by-step tutorials here * **part 1 the granny squares arrangement & seaming** 2 * **part 2 the strap** 3 if you love this design be sure to check out the ** wildrose backpack 4 ** using the same yarn and centering around the same beautiful wildrose granny square 1 https //www etsy com/ca/listing/703463276/wildrose-market-bag-crochet-pattern 2 https //www allaboutami com/wildrose-market-bag-part-1/ 3 https //www allaboutami com/wildrose-market-bag-part-2/ 4 https //www allaboutami com/pattern-the-wildrose-backpack/
